I'm having trouble getting Makie to play ball: for some reason, the GUI window will not pop up - e.g., following the basic example from the tutorial
```using GLMakie
AbstractPlotting.inline!(true)

points = [Point2f0(cos(t), sin(t)) for t in LinRange(0, 2pi, 20)]
colors = 1:20
figure, axis, scatterobject = scatter(points, color = colors, markersize = 15)
figure```
just prints the figure struct - it doesn't display it. Similarly, calling `display(figure)` just print the figure struct. I didn't have this problem in the past. Any ideas?

Okay; kind strange, but despite having done `pkg> build` and `pkg> instantiate` several times, what finally fixed this was just going into the package directory and removing everything I could see that related to Makie/AbstractPlotting and then re-adding the package.
